category.name: Thin Client.Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEMBOM_Mirror_Align_Existing_Mbom_Items
preference.preference_description: Defines the alignment of top-level context IDs (IDICs) of manufacturing BOM (MBOM) lines based on their corresponding engineering BOM (EBOM) lines. Valid Values: 0 - No alignment. 1 - Alignment of IDIC values of MBOM lines only for EBOM lines that have an IDIC value. 2 - Alignment of IDIC values of MBOM lines using the EBOM lines. If no IDIC value exists on an EBOM node, the item ID and transform values are used for equivalence.
